Package ev3dev.actuators.lego.motors

Class BasicMotor

  • java.lang.Object
    • ev3dev.hardware.EV3DevDevice
      • ev3dev.hardware.EV3DevMotorDevice
        • ev3dev.actuators.lego.motors.BasicMotor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    lejos.robotics.BaseMotor, lejos.robotics.DCMotor
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    UnregulatedMotor
    public abstract class BasicMotor
extends EV3DevMotorDevice
implements lejos.robotics.DCMotor
    Abstraction for basic motors operations.

    Unregulated motors only is enabled for EV3Brick.

    Author:
    Lawrie Griffiths., Juan Antonio Bre√±a Moral

      • flt

        public void flt()
        Causes motors to float. The motors will lose all power, but this is not the same as stopping. Use this method if you don't want your robot to trip in abrupt turns.
        Specified by:
        flt in interface lejos.robotics.BaseMotor

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Causes motors to stop, pretty much instantaneously. In other words, the motors doesn't just stop; it will resist any further motion. Cancels any rotate() orders in progress
        Specified by:
        stop in interface lejos.robotics.BaseMotor
